thread.title: Future Announces New Album HNDRXX | Pitchfork
thread.title_full: Future Announces New Album HNDRXX | Pitchfork

title: Future Announces New Album HNDRXX | Pitchfork
text:
Future Announces New Album HNDRXX His second album in a week Future Photo By Prince Williams/Wireimage 
Future has announced another new album, following the release of his self-titled LP last week. It’s called HNDRXX , and it’s out this Friday. He tagged Rihanna and the Weeknd in his announcement on Instagram , teasing possible appearances on the project. On his last album, the Atlanta rapper referenced Donald Trump’s lewd comments during the 2016 campaign and sampled a song by Arcade Fire. Told YALL,I got a fully loaded clip...thought I was bluffing #HNDRXX
